==== Brasero ====

Cd/Dvd burning comes of age on Gnome platform with this simple to follow tool.

'''Tests to try'''

** Copy the install cd.
** Copy the install cd to file (creating an iso).
** Burn the iso.
** If you have any music try creating a music cd.
